profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Web Test Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **Playwright**, **Selenium**, and **TypeScript** for comprehensive testing solutions. My background in **Python** enhances my ability to automate tests and integrate them seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **k8s**. I am proficient in **React** and have experience with **Django**, enabling me to effectively collaborate with full-stack development projects while ensuring the robustness of applications.

I am well-versed in utilizing **OpenAPI**, **Celery**, **RabbitMQ**, **SQLAlchemy**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** to facilitate back-end testing strategies, providing thorough validation of data-centric applications. My strong foundation in cloud services including **Azure**, **Heroku**, and **GCP** allows for efficient deployment and testing environments.

In addition, I bring proven expertise in Agile methodologies, effective communication, and exceptional problem-solving abilities that complement my technical skills, enabling me to deliver high-quality, reliable software solutions.
